short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add new Context Menu for download LINE Animated Sticker when right click on sticker's URL within LINE Sticker Shop website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this extension, you can download LINE animated sticker very easy. Just right click on sticker's URL within LINE sticker shop and choose "Download Animated Sticker" from context menu.
